General.Name: Dongrui Food Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Dongrui Food Group Co., Ltd. operates pig breeding farms. The company breeds, supplies, and slaughters live pigs; and provides feed and fertilizers that are used for pig breeding. It offers its products under the Dongrui brand name. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Heyuan, China.

1.Name: Dongqiang  Zeng
1.Title: Board Sec., Deputy Gen. Mang. and Director
